Republicans livid as chaos threatens to cannibalize House majority … - The Republican-led House passed the spending bill just before noon Friday and sent it to the Senate — with more than half the House GOP conference, including many furious hardliners, voting against it.

Two suspects in Moscow attack detained, others flee after car chase, lawmaker says  —  Russia said on Saturday it had arrested all four gunmen suspected of carrying out a shooting massacre in a concert hall near Moscow, and President Vladimir Putin pledged to track down and punish those behind the attack.

What to know about Islamic State group, which claimed the Moscow attack  —  The Islamic State group has claimed responsibility for Friday's deadly attack on a popular concert venue on the outskirts of Moscow, which killed at least 133 people.  —  The group's rapid capture of large swaths of Iraq and Syria in 2014 shocked the world.

NBC News hires former GOP chairwoman Ronna McDaniel  —  Ronna McDaniel, who stepped down as chairwoman of the Republican National Committee this month, will join NBC News as a political analyst, angering media critics because of her work to overturn the results of the 2020 election.
